name: TeleSource Center
tag_list: lead-generation, telemarketing, b2b-lead-generation, inbound-call-center, appointment-setting, b2b-telemarketing, call-center, outsourced-telemarketing, outsourced-appointment-setting, event-registration, telemarketers, b2b, b2c
overview:
TeleSource Center, located in Bend, Oregon, provides superior business-to-business (B2B) outbound telemarketing solutions, inbound call center services and database list products for companies across many industries.

Companies that want to increase their sales utilize TeleSource Center for appointment setting, lead generation, event registration, surveys, sales lead follow up, data cleansing, email acquisition and brand awareness.

The boutique firm hires only the best professionals in the industry and works very closely with clients to ensure a successful and mutually beneficial long-term business relationship. Call 800.770.4350 or visit www.telesourcecenter.com for more information.
